section.title: SBT
section.para: Get latest sbt, this project uses 0.11.2

section.title: DocBook plugin
section.para: The original plugin did not worked for me due to missing dependencies, as I managed to make it work from a forked version, and in order to share what I learned and provide a sample project, I decided to fork it and publish it to my local ivy cache.
section.programlisting: $ git clone git@github.com:jm2dev/sbt-docbook-plugin.git $ cd sbt-docbook-plugin $ sbt package publish-local
